full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,CHOS SKYONG DREGS PA LCAM SRING LA GTOR 'BUL BYA TSUL 'KHYER BDE BSAM DON LHUN GRUB ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @005A *, ,(CES PA 'DI NI CHOS SKYONG KHYAD PAR CAN DE NYID @005B SNGON NAS CHOS DANG RIGS KYI BRGYUD PAS BSTEN ZHING YANG BSGOS BSTAN PA RAB RGYAS GLING GI BSRUNG MAR MNGA' GSOL BAS GTOR 'BUL RGYUN 'DON BYED CHOG PA ZHIG DGOS ZHES BSTAN PA'I SBYIN BDAG CHEN PO, ,THU SA LAG CHE 'ER TI NO YON RIG 'DZIN RDO RJES RAB DKAR LHA RDZAS BCAS BSKUL BA'I NGOR, AER TE NI JO BO'I BLA MING 'CHANG BA ^SNGAGS RAMS PA RATNA DHVA DZAS DGON GNAS DGE BSOG GLING DU SBYAR BA'I YI GE PA NI RNAM DPYOD @006A *, ,LDAN PA'I DGE SLONG BSOD NAMS RDO RJES BGYIS PA 'DIS KYANG THUB BSTAN RIN PO CHE 'DI NYID MI NUB PA'I RGYAL MTSAN MI 'GYUR BA'I GA-YUNG DRUNG MI SHIG PA'I RDO RJER GYUR CIG , ,,)
